summary: A comedian performs a stand-up routine, humorously imagining scenarios related to being Mexican and living in Mexico, including building a wall and the impact on travel destinations like Cancun and Puerto Vallarta. The routine also touches on the perceived racism of white girls wanting to go to Cancun for spring break. The video concludes with a tour poster for "Mo Amer El Oso Palestino Tour."
transcript: If I was Mexican living in Mexico, I'd flip the whole script. I would I'd be like, You know what bro? We're building a wall. Okay? We're building a wall. You can't come to Cancun no more, Puto. How about that? How about that? White girls crying all across America. Oh my god, I wanted to go to Cancun for spring break. Why are they so racist? I don't understand. Now I have to go to Puerto Vallarta. That's also in Mexico. Oh my god.
